thread.section_title: SelectQuote Senior Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SelectQuote Senior | selectquotesenior.com
thread.title: SUSAN P
thread.title_full: SelectQuote Senior reviewed by SUSAN P

author: SUSAN P
title: SUSAN P
text:
I was very anxious as I started my journey to find supplemental insurance under the Medicare plan. Kathleen put my mind to rest and made the experience easy and flawless. The plans she recommended suited my needs perfectly . She put me in touch with each lead person for the plans I desired. Each representative was knowledgable, answering all of my questions ( and I had many). I would recommend SelectQuote: Senior to any of my friends looking to find a supplemental plan in the vast sea of insurance companies.
Frankly, I don't know why anyone would struggle finding a policy when the experts at SelectQuote: have done all the hard work for them.
